message.body: I received a text from a guy I have just talked to on the phone, I'm going to forward it to you, if you have time to help me decide what to reply.
(1/2) Fwd: well #####.....it seems like, I don't hear from you unless I initiate the contact. I'm sure your life is full, vibrant and no doubt exciting, and y
(1/2) Fwd: engage with whichever guy hits you up that day, (and there's plenty of them). that's a great place to be in. I hope that lasts a long time for you
Fwd: you going. the things you say about me and how I make you feel and think etc, are nice and all, but if you get serious about those sentiments, look me up
You don't really need to reply at all. But if you want to be sassy, I'd say, "Thanks, Tom!!!" Or whatever his name is, obviously.
Geez, we haven't even gone out...never even met him. Wtf?
